banner_desc: Cboard is an open-source app for children and adults with speech and language impairments, aiding communication with symbols and text-to-speech.
feature_desc1: Cboard works on modern browsers and is available on a wide variety of platforms, including desktops, tablets and mobile phones. Offline support is available on Google Chrome (desktop & android).
feature_desc2: We use last technology trends to design and develop Cboard. Our ultimate goal is to offer a beautiful and intuitive interface that can be navigated without reading the user help.
feature_desc3: Check out what you can do with Cboard in the open!
feature_video: For Mobile Apps - automate mobile ads
showcase_title: Open Source, +45 languages, Modern UI, Crossplatform
faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions to find your answer.
news_desc: Read more about latest news and our events and workshops
footer_text: What are you waiting for? Download Now!
